DataElement.preferredName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Term Flag Other Required java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.:A word or expression used for some particular thing._An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Necessary, not optional._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

Concepts.longName: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
Concepts.definition: A standard terminology developed to report adverse events occurring in cancer clinical trials.  Common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) are used in study adverse event summaries and Investigational New Drug reports to the Food and Drug Administration.  The CTCAE contain a grading scale for each adverse event term representing the severity of the event.
A word or expression used for some particular thing.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Necessary, not optional.

Concepts.definition: An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
